Hey, Just another post to show you these humble offings and giving you a chance to experience the SMEXY Virtkick panel!

**$3 - 1GB** Small but powerful  
1 vCPU  
1GB RAM  
5GB SSD  
1Gbit Shared (Fair use)  
[Link](https://c82.myvirtkick.com/machines/new?plan_id=15)


**$5 - 2GB** Brilliant all round  
2 vCPU  
2GB RAM  
10GB SSD  
1Gbit Shared (Fair use)  
[Link](https://c82.myvirtkick.com/machines/new?plan_id=7)


CA Nodes are _E3 1245v2_ and FR are _i7 4970K_

Payment through Stripe or Paypal (Braintree) Minimum payment $6
